summary: A black comedy that follows three generations of a family, who come together for the funeral of the patriarch - unveiling a litany of family secrets and covert relationships.
cast: Zooey Deschanel|Micole Mercurio|Lucy Boyle|Tania Gunadi|Kevin Ruf|Alex Moore|Hank Azaria|Michael Panes|Michael Chapman|Vincent Castellanos|Lisa Maris|Ray Romano|Rocco Sisto|Lana Antonova|Denise Dowse|Curtis Garcia|Keith Garcia|Debra Winger|Mark Harelik|Matthew Feder|Allisyn Snyder|Jordan Moen|Natasha Sheridan|Rip Torn|Piper Laurie|Rance Howard|Paget Brewster|Kelly Preston|Famke Janssen|Mary Samuels|Jesse Bradford|Emma Chapman|Brandon Waters|Monica Esswein|Aaron Salazar|Shaunci Trammel|Ward Stearns Jr.|Sara Botsford|John Lafayette|Glenne Headly|Brian Posehn|Eric Pierpoint|Sherman Howard|Rene Auberjonois|Claudette Nevins|Tyana Parr|Anna Stookey
title: Enredos de familia
